author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
We're back with VOIDFIGHTERS, the latest in the Osprey Wargames series by Space Weirdos author Casey Garske. Have Starfighters you're not using anymore? Got a collection of models or toy spaceships you always wanted to Dogfight? Check out VOIDFIGHTERS, a miniature agnostic Spaceship Dogfighting game from Osprey!

Big thanks to Osprey for the Complimentary copy of the book to review. 

Check out the rules HERE: https://www.ospreypublishing.com/ca/voidfighter-9781472866448/

Music "Retrofuture Nasty" by Kevin McLeod used via Creative Commons
title: GMG Reviews - VOIDFIGHTERS by Casey Garske & Osprey Games

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Looking for a ruleset to craft Low-Fantasy battles of Cavalry, Infantry and big Monsters and Artillery? VOID ADMIRAL author and fellow Canadian Paul Bantock is back wiht Black Iron Sigil, a blood-soaked dark low-fantasy game for 30-50 models. Let's check it out!

Grab a copy HERE: https://www.wargamevault.com/product/533272/Black-Iron-Sigil?affiliate_id=210041

Big thanks to Paul for the complimentary copy of the book to review. 

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Join us on DISCORD: https://discord.com/invite/XTqqxctryq

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

GMG Measuring Gauges and Tokens available HERE: http://deathraydesigns.com/product-category/accessories/guerrilla-miniature-games/

GMG T-Shi
title: GMG Reviews - BLACK IRON SIGIL by Paul Bantock
